div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 202 Marathon, Attica, 1936 (649) Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 167 AE Locri Opuntii: 45 (as BMC 54 [1]; 71 [1]; 77-8 [23]; 79 [20]) Phocis: 108 (as BMC 66 [52]; 76 [56]) Boeotia: 14 (as BMC 57, 108) Disposition: formerly J. P. Shear coll. (stolen Dec. 1968) List of varieties on file in ANS
